panels.description: Number of database queries currently executing
panels.title: Queries In Flight

panels.description: Query latency percentiles across all operations
panels.title: Query Latency (Overall)

panels.description: p95 query latency broken down by operation type (SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE)
panels.title: Query Latency by Operation (p95)

panels.description: Queries per second broken down by operation type
panels.title: Query Rate by Operation

panels.description: Queries per second broken down by table
panels.title: Query Rate by Table

panels.description: p95 query latency per table — identify which tables are slowest
panels.title: Query Latency by Table (p95)

panels.description: Failed database queries by table and operation
panels.title: Query Errors by Table & Operation

panels.description: Connection pool metrics over time. Pool Size = allocated connections (lazy). Max = DB_MAX_CONNECTIONS.
panels.title: Connection Pool

panels.description: Percentage of maximum connections allocated and in use
panels.title: Pool Allocation %

panels.description: Lock counts on the explorer database — high lock counts indicate contention
panels.title: Database Locks by Mode

panels.description: PostgreSQL backend connections by state from pg_stat_activity
panels.title: PG Backends by State

panels.description: PostgreSQL shared buffer cache hit ratio — should be >99% in production. Low values indicate too small shared_buffers or working set doesn't fit in memory.
panels.title: Buffer Cache Hit Ratio

panels.description: Disk blocks read vs cache hits — reads from disk indicate cache misses
panels.title: Block I/O

panels.description: Temporary files created — indicates queries needing more work_mem for sorts/hashes
panels.title: Temp Files & Bytes

panels.description: Deadlocks and query conflicts — any deadlocks indicate a concurrency problem
panels.title: Deadlocks & Conflicts

panels.description: Row-level operations across all tables — shows workload composition
panels.title: Row Operations

panels.description: Sequential scans vs index scans — high seq scan rate on large tables may indicate missing indexes
panels.title: Seq Scans vs Index Scans

panels.description: Seq scan rate per table — tables with high sequential scans may benefit from better indexes
panels.title: Top Tables by Seq Scans

panels.description: Dead tuples per table — high counts indicate autovacuum is falling behind
panels.title: Dead Tuples by Table

panels.description: Background writer buffers — shows checkpoint and background write pressure
panels.title: Background Writer Buffers

panels.description: Checkpoint events — timed checkpoints are normal, requested indicate WAL pressure
panels.title: Checkpoints

panels.description: Total messages sent to Dead Letter Queue after max retries exceeded
panels.title: DLQ Messages by Transform Type

panels.description: DLQ messages grouped by failure reason
panels.title: DLQ Messages by Reason

panels.description: Total DLQ messages across all transforms
panels.title: Total DLQ Messages

panels.description: Rate of messages going to DLQ per minute
panels.title: DLQ Rate
